comment: This will be a parti-gyle split into two gallons each of lager and ale, BIAB mash the entire grain bill, boil Columbus 40 minutes, turn off heat, steep Mount Hood for 20 minutes, drain into respective 2 gallon buckets, add 0.75 oz Willamete to the ale bucket only. No chill, let cool overnight and pitch different yeasts the next day, move the lager to the fermenter fridge.
